attributes.action: do not wish to see tony blair as europe president
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
tony blair is not the right person for european presidency . this man is too corrupt and financially too self centred.
it is not democratic to appoint a president against the will of the citizens and mr blair certainly is not peoples´choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
